title: Dakaretai Otoko 1-i ni Odosarete Imasu. Movie: Spain-hen

synonyms: Dakaretai Otoko Ichii ni Odosarete Imasu. Movie
alternative_titles.en: Dakaichi: I'm Being Harassed By the Sexiest Man of the Year the Movie - Spain Arc
alternative_titles.ja: 劇場版 抱かれたい男1位に脅されています。～スペイン編～

synopsis:
Takato Saijou and Junta Azumaya—Japan's sexiest men—perform wonders together as co-stars. Their next joint assignment is to act in a play featuring a flamenco showdown, but Junta once again holds an advantage due to his ancestry and because Takato has never danced before. Fueled by his ceaseless desire to outshine Junta, Takato decides to travel to southern Spain and learn firsthand the passion needed to perform the demanding dance.

In the warm and friendly Spanish streets, Takato meets a wonderful flamenco dancer, an older handsome gentleman by the name of Ceres. Although Takato wishes to learn from him, his plans are soon interrupted by Junta's arrival in the area to visit his grandfather's hometown. Now, aside from struggling to reach Junta's skill level, Takato must also deal with Junta's family and face off against Antonio—an unexpected rival for Junta's love.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
